constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the piggy bank

params._owner: The owner of this piggy bank

depositETH().details: Deposit ETH to the piggy bank

depositToken(uint256).details: Deposit ERC20 tokens to the piggy bank

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: Emergency withdrawal with 3% penalty (before lock period expires)

getBalance().details: Get current balance of the piggy bank

returns.isLocked: Whether the bank is still locked

isLockExpired().details: Check if lock period has expired

returns._0: True if lock period has expired

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw funds after lock period expires (no penalty)
